name: Ktulu Rises
description:
Please click on the fullscreen button for a better experience, thanks!

In the dark world of Old Ones, a nonstop cruel battle to define the mightiest. Every creature seeks power and control from the weakest to the strongest.

The only way to rise and be the king is to defeat and collect essences, and then have enough power to be the mightiest.

Controls:

W A S D - Movement

Left Mouse Button - Shoot

P - Pause/Upgrade Skills

Use the Nekronomicon as your guide!

Game current in development:

- I expect to finish this game in two or three months, with more content, polishing, and rebalance.
